title: Suturing with Light
objective:
'The proponents aim to establish an international leading company in the field of innovative medical devices for laser eye surgery, keratoplasty in particular (cornea transplantation): the objective is to become pioneers in the field of ophthalmic surgery with a novel surgical technique of cornea laser welding for keratoplasty called SWeetLight (suturing with light). The specific aim is realise a medical device able to:
ï improve the quality and the overall precision of the keratoplasty,
ï standardize the surgical treatment by enhancing surgeon skills using robotic platform adopting collaborative control system to optimize the welding task of corneal wounds.
ï strongly reduce the risk of rejection and also of astigmatism, also respecting and preserving the donorís cornea, 
ï reduce the duration of the post-hospitalization phase: faster and safer visual recovery (fast ìback to workî)
ï reduce the dependency of the intervention from the surgeon skills.
From ìbusinessî point of view the objective is to reach the Break Even Point (BEP) at the end of year #2, and a value of revenues of Ä 4 million at the end of year #5.
'
